headline.main: BRITISH IN SYRIA READY FOR NAZIS; Gen. Wilson's Force Built Up to Meet Any German Drive Through Turkey

lead_paragraph: BEIRUT, Syria, Nov. 22 (Delayed) (U.P.) -- If the Germans attempt a diversion southward through Turkey in an effort to divert Britain's push into Italian Libya they will find themselves up against a powerful, well-equipped army of Englishmen, British Imperials and Free French.
abstract: Gen Sir H M Wilson forces ready in Syria for any possible German drive through Turkey

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
